issues.shortMessage: Remove this formatting call and simply use the input string.
issues.fullMessage: There's no need to incur the overhead of a formatting call when the string to be formatted contains no formatting symbols. Instead, simply use the original input string.

properties.title: "string.Format()" should not be called without placeholders
